title: Enhancing Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Foundations and Practical Applications in Pharmacogenomics

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic pharmaceutical and genetic concepts
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: One can explain the principles of utilizing genomic data in determining optimal drug dosages
One can design a secure storage system for drug-metabolism-related genetic information
One can create personalized treatment plans using pharmacogenomics analysis software (GeneScription)
One can identify ethical issues in genomic data utilization and propose solutions
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
